com.github.wuic.nut.dao

Interface NutDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNutDao, AbstractNutDao.WithRootPathNutDao, ClasspathNutDao, DiskNutDao, HttpNutDao, PathNutDao, ProxyNutDao, RequestDispatcherNutDao, WebappNutDao

    public interface NutDao

    This interface abstracts the way you can read and eventually save nuts through a particular protocol.

    Since:
    0.3.1
    Version:
    1.6
    Author:
    Guillaume DROUET

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  NutDao.PathFormat
      This enumeration specifies formats of path specified to create nuts.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Nut> create(String path)
      Creates a list of nuts thanks to the given path considered as represented in any format.

      Indicates if the given path exists or not.

      Shutdowns this DAO by releasing its resources.

      Returns an instance that prefixes any nut name to be created with the given root path.

    • Method Detail

      • observe

        void observe(String realPath,
           NutDaoListener... listeners)
             throws IOException

        Adds a set of listeners to be notified when an update has been detected on the nut. The targeted nut is represented by the specified path.

        The listeners will be stored in a weak reference so if no strong reference to them exist, they will be garbage collected.

        Parameters:
        realPath - the real path name of the nut.
        listeners - some listeners to be notified when an update has been detected on a nut
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O occurs while retrieving last update of the nut

      • create

        List<Nut> create(String path)
                 throws IOException

        Creates a list of nuts thanks to the given path considered as represented in any format.

        Parameters:
        path - the path representing the location of the nut(s)
        Returns:
        the created nut(s)
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the nut
        See Also:
        create(String, NutDao.PathFormat)

      • create

        List<Nut> create(String path,
               NutDao.PathFormat format)
                 throws IOException

        Creates a list of nuts thanks to the given path.

        A NutDao.PathFormat also gives information on the format used in the string representation of the given path.

        Parameters:
        path - the path representing the location of the nut(s)
        format - the path format
        Returns:
        the created nut(s)
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the nut

      • proxyUriFor

        String proxyUriFor(Nut nut)

        Returns an URI in a String representation of a proxy serving the given nut.

        If many proxies are defined, proxy URI is selected in a round-robin mode. Each time a proxy is used, it won't be reused until all other proxies have been used too.

        Parameters:
        nut - the nut
        Returns:
        the proxy URI, null if not proxy is set

      • save

        void save(Nut nut)

        Saves the give nut. An UnsupportedOperationException will be thrown if the implementation supports only nut access.

        Parameters:
        nut - the nut to save

      • saveSupported

        Boolean saveSupported()

        Indicates if this DAO is able to save a nut, which depends on the underlying protocol.

        Returns:
        true if save(Nut) is supported, false otherwise

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()

        Shutdowns this DAO by releasing its resources.

      • withRootPath

        NutDao withRootPath(String rootPath)

        Returns an instance that prefixes any nut name to be created with the given root path.

        Parameters:
        rootPath - the root path
        Returns:
        the enclosed instance

      • newInputStream

        InputStream newInputStream(String path)
                           throws IOException

        Opens the stream for the given path.

        Parameters:
        path - the path to access
        Returns:
        the stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if stream could not be opened

      • exists

        Boolean exists(String path)
               throws IOException

        Indicates if the given path exists or not.

        Parameters:
        path - the path the DAO should be able to resolve
        Returns:
        true if path is resolved, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException - if any I/O error occurs
